titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to John B. Lindsey
CWG13764

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To John B Lindsey Dr.

row.cell: To Services rendered in assisting in the organization of the Enrolled Militia of the state during the month of June

body.p: This claim is approved, and the Q. M. Genl is ordered to pay the same out of the militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Insp -- Quarter-Master, Gen. Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 30th of June, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eighty three Dollars, and Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To John B Lindsey Dr.

row.cell: To Services rendered in assisting in the organization of the Enrolled Militia of the state during the month of June

body.p: This claim is approved, and the Q M Genl is ordered to pay the same out of the militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Insp -- Quarter-Master, Gen. Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, of 186., of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Dollars, and Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
Jno B Lindsey
Dollars 8333/100
Paid 30 June, 1864.
Militia
10
